de.targodan.usb.data

Class Case

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • de.targodan.usb.data.Case
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Case
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    The Case class represents a fuelrats case.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Case

        public Case(int number,
            Client client,
            System system,
            boolean codeRed)
        Constructs a Case with number, client, system and codeRed status. The opening time will be set to the current time.
        Parameters:
        number - Number of the case as given by MechaSqueak.
        client - The client information.
        system - The system as reported by the client or rats.
        codeRed - Whether or not the case is a code red.

      • Case

        public Case(int number,
            Client client,
            System system,
            boolean codeRed,
            java.time.LocalDateTime openTime)
        Constructs a Case with number, client, system and codeRed status.
        Parameters:
        number - Number of the case as given by MechaSqueak.
        client - The client information.
        system - The system as reported by the client or rats.
        codeRed - Whether or not the case is a code red.
        openTime - The time at which the case was opened.

        Assigns a rat to a case.
        Parameters:
        rat - The rat to be assigned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If there are already 3 rats assigned.

      • attachManager

        public void attachManager(CaseManager manager)
        Attaches a CaseManager that will be notified when this Case is closed. This is automatically called by the CaseManager it is added to.
        Parameters:
        manager - The CaseManager to be attached.
        See Also:
        CaseManager.addCase(de.targodan.usb.data.Case)

      • addCall

        public void addCall(Rat rat)
        Adds a jump call of a rat. Rats that call won't be automatically assigned. However if the rat was already assigned they won't be added again but instead their jumps will be updated.
        Parameters:
        rat - The call to be added.

      • getCalls

        public java.util.List<Rat> getCalls()
        Returns all unassigned rats that have called for this case.
        Returns:
        all unassigned rats that have called for this case.

      • lookupAssociatedRat

        public Rat lookupAssociatedRat(java.lang.String ircName)
        Searches for a rat with the given IRC name. Preferably an assigned rat is returned. If no assigned rat with this name can be found an unassigned rat that has called jumps will be returned. If no such rat can be found either null is returned.
        Parameters:
        ircName - The irc name to be set.
        Returns:
        A rat with the given name or null if no such rat can be found.
